publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3065 Stuart McMillan: Bishopbriggs Drummer Success—That the Parliament congratulates Bishopbriggs Academy pupil Steven Shedden on winning the under-16 world solo drummer award at the World Solo Drumming Championships and notes that Steven has been drumming since he was nine years old and was one of 200 people who took part in the 2008 championships event held recently in Glasgow.

S3M-3065 Bishopbriggs Drummer Success (lodged on 8 December 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Jackson Carlaw*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3065 Bishopbriggs Drummer Success (lodged on 8 December 2008) Keith Brown*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3065 Bishopbriggs Drummer Success (lodged on 8 December 2008) Willie Coffey*

S3M-3065 Stuart McMillan: Bishopbriggs Drummer Success—That the Parliament congratulates Bishopbriggs Academy pupil Steven Shedden on winning the under-16 world solo drummer award at the World Solo Drumming Championships and notes that Steven has been drumming since he was nine years old and was one of 200 people who took part in the 2008 championships event held recently in Glasgow. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Aileen Campbell, Kenneth Gibson, Bob Doris, Jackson Carlaw, Bashir Ahmad, Rob Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Christina McKelvie, Keith Brown, Bill Kidd, Willie Coffey, Gil Paterson*, Michael Matheson*
